name: Uncompress File
description: Receives a compressed file (zip, tar) and uncompresses it to a specified directory. (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

compressed_file.name: compressed_file
compressed_file.info: Upload a compressed file (zip, tar) to uncompress.

code.value:
from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.inputs import FileInput
from axiestudio.io import MessageTextInput, Output
from axiestudio.schema.message import Data
import zipfile
import tarfile
import os
# Component Create By Fabricando Sua Ideia: https://www.youtube.com/@fabricandosuaideiatutoriais

class UncompressComponent(Component):
    display_name = "Uncompress File Component"
    description = "Receives a compressed file (zip, tar) and uncompresses it to a specified directory."
    icon = "file-archive"

    inputs = [
        FileInput(
            name="compressed_file",
            display_name="Compressed File",
            info="Upload a compressed file (zip, tar) to uncompress.",
            file_types=["zip", "tar"],  # Allow zip and tar files
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="output_directory",
            display_name="Output Directory",
            info="Specify the directory to uncompress the files to (e.g., 'axiestudio/uncompressed_folder').",
            placeholder="axiestudio/uncompressed_folder",
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Uncompressed Files", name="uncompressed_files", method="uncompress_file"),
    ]

    def uncompress_file(self) -> Data:
        compressed_file = self.compressed_file
        output_dir = self.output_directory or "uncompressed_files"

        # Create the directory if it does not exist
        if not os.path.exists(output_dir):
            os.makedirs(output_dir)

        # Determine the file extension
        file_ext = os.path.splitext(compressed_file)[1].lower()

        if file_ext == ".zip":
            self._uncompress_zip(compressed_file, output_dir)
        elif file_ext == ".tar":
            self._uncompress_tar(compressed_file, output_dir)
        else:
            self.status = "Unsupported file type."
            return Data(data={"error": "Unsupported file type."})

        # List the uncompressed files
        uncompressed_files = os.listdir(output_dir)
        self.status = f"Uncompressed {len(uncompressed_files)} files to {output_dir}."
        return Data(data={"files": uncompressed_files, "output_directory": output_dir})

    def _uncompress_zip(self, zip_file, output_dir):
        with zipfile.ZipFile(zip_file, 'r') as zip_ref:
            zip_ref.extractall(output_dir)

    def _uncompress_tar(self, tar_file, output_dir):
        with tarfile.open(tar_file, 'r') as tar_ref:
            tar_ref.extractall(output_dir)

output_directory.name: output_directory
output_directory.info: Specify the directory to uncompress the files to (e.g., 'axiestudio/uncompressed_folder').

from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.inputs import FileInput
from axiestudio.io import MessageTextInput, Output
from axiestudio.schema.message import Data
import zipfile
import tarfile
import os
# Component Create By Fabricando Sua Ideia: https://www.youtube.com/@fabricandosuaideiatutoriais

class UncompressComponent(Component):
    display_name = "Uncompress File Component"
    description = "Receives a compressed file (zip, tar) and uncompresses it to a specified directory."
    icon = "file-archive"

    inputs = [
        FileInput(
            name="compressed_file",
            display_name="Compressed File",
            info="Upload a compressed file (zip, tar) to uncompress.",
            file_types=["zip", "tar"],  # Allow zip and tar files
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="output_directory",
            display_name="Output Directory",
            info="Specify the directory to uncompress the files to (e.g., 'axiestudio/uncompressed_folder').",
            placeholder="axiestudio/uncompressed_folder",
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Uncompressed Files", name="uncompressed_files", method="uncompress_file"),
    ]

    def uncompress_file(self) -> Data:
        compressed_file = self.compressed_file
        output_dir = self.output_directory or "uncompressed_files"

        # Create the directory if it does not exist
        if not os.path.exists(output_dir):
            os.makedirs(output_dir)

        # Determine the file extension
        file_ext = os.path.splitext(compressed_file)[1].lower()

        if file_ext == ".zip":
            self._uncompress_zip(compressed_file, output_dir)
        elif file_ext == ".tar":
            self._uncompress_tar(compressed_file, output_dir)

            return Data(data={"error": "Unsupported file type."})

        # List the uncompressed files
        uncompressed_files = os.listdir(output_dir)
        self.status = f"Uncompressed {len(uncompressed_files)} files to {output_dir}."
        return Data(data={"files": uncompressed_files, "output_directory": output_dir})

    def _uncompress_zip(self, zip_file, output_dir):
        with zipfile.ZipFile(zip_file, 'r') as zip_ref:
            zip_ref.extractall(output_dir)

    def _uncompress_tar(self, tar_file, output_dir):
        with tarfile.open(tar_file, 'r') as tar_ref:
